description:
Electrical CAD Software

ProfiCAD is designed for drawing electrical and electronic diagrams, schematics, and control circuit diagrams. It can also be used for pneumatics, hydraulics, and other types of technical diagrams.
Faster rendering of wires and line objects
The new version significantly improves the rendering speed of wires, curves, and line-based objects. The optimization is most noticeable in complex drawings and at higher zoom levels.
